About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself...

Hi, My name is Binyamin Abebe, and I am looking for a job as a web developer. I have skills in the following languages and technologies:

  • JavaScript, ES6, HTML5, CSS3
  • Bootstrap, Sass, jQuery
  • ReactJS, Redux, Angular
  • Node.JS, Express, Socket.io
  • MongoDB, SQL, MySQL
  • Docker, TypeScript

I have learned all these languages and technologies with hard work and passion. I strongly believe that someone like me would be a valuable addition to any team.

My favorite quote is:

" I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying. " - Michael Jordan
